Pre-Game Insights: The Astros are favored at -175 after their Game 1 loss, with the Tigers as +145 underdogs.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Hunter Brown has dominated Detroit throughout the regular season, holding the Tigers to a.198 batting average in his two starts against them this season, allowing just two earned runs across 14 innings.
Others: The Astros have been one of the most consistent teams in the league.
The Tigers will need to rely on their pitching staff to keep the game close if they are to secure a series win.
The Astros are 8-3 in their last 11 home games as favorites.
The Astros are 5-1 in their last six games after a loss.
